831:10: iti samyak stutā devī vāgīśena mahātmanā || 5 ||
831:13: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadanta yatte manasi vartate || 6 ||
831:15: prasannā yadi me devī divyaṃ jñānaṃ pradīyatām |
831:17: stotreṇānena ye bhaktyā māṃ stuvanti sadā narāḥ || 7 ||
831:19: kavitvaṃ matprasādena tathā ca vipulaṃ yaśaḥ || 8 ||
831:20: trisandhyaṃ prayato bhūtvā yaḥ stotraṃ paṭhate naraḥ |
831:21: tasya kaṇṭhe sadā vāsaṃ kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ || 9 ||
831:22: om aiṃ vāgvādini mama jihvāyāṃ eeṃ hrīṃ mantrasarasvati svāhā |
